name: What is Programming
description: Programming enables you to automate tasks and manage cloud resources efficiently. Understanding the basics will help you throughout your cloud journey.

learning_steps.title: What is Programming
learning_steps.description: Discover what programming is and how it's used to automate tasks and build applications in cloud environments.

learning_steps.title: Programming vs Scripting Languages
learning_steps.description: Understand the difference between programming and scripting—both are useful in cloud engineering.
